name: Paper Toss VR
description: A casual and relaxing experience made for VR,Throw a paper ball in right way and get high score!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4590 equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-6800 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 Storage: 4 GB available space
